PISTOL.strategy: **A Main Rush**: All 5 players buy armor, rush A main with coordinated pop-flashes. Clear heaven/default angles quickly, focus on site control with trades.
**B Rush**: 4 players rush B main with armor and flashes, 1 player A main for late rotate. B players coordinate pop-flashes, clear site systematically.
**Mid Control**: 3 players mid (1 with smoke), 2 players A main. Mid players smoke connector, take upper mid control. A players create pressure.
**A Split**: 2 players A main, 3 players mid to connector. A players smoke heaven, mid players coordinate timing through connector. Execute together.
**Canal Control**: 3 players canal with utility, 2 players A main. Canal players smoke connector, take canal control with flashes. Play for picks.
**B Default**: 2 players B main, 2 players mid, 1 player A main. Play for picks and information. Mid players smoke connector if CTs push.
**Connector Rush**: 4 players mid to connector with pop-flashes, 1 player B main. Connector players coordinate utility, rush A site through connector.
**A Fake to B**: 3 players make noise A main with utility, 2 players position mid. Once rotations happen, all execute B through mid.
**Palace Control**: 3 players mid focusing on palace area, 2 players A main. Palace players smoke connector, take control with coordination.
**Anti-Stack**: 2 players A main, 2 players B main, 1 player mid. Create pressure from multiple angles. Mid player calls rotations.

ECO.strategy: **Five-Seven A Rush**: Everyone buys Five-Seven + armor. Rush A main together with pop-flashes. Focus on overwhelming heaven player and trading kills.
**Stack B Main**: All 5 players stack B main area. Buy upgraded pistols + armor. Play close angles around site, use pop-flashes for coordination.
**Mid Lurk**: 1 player lurks mid with upgraded pistol, 4 players force buy A main. Mid player waits for rotations, goes for connector picks.
**Deagle Mid**: 2 players buy Deagle + armor mid, 3 players support. Deagles take long angles upper mid/connector. Support players trade.
**Canal Control**: 4 players buy armor + upgraded pistols canal, 1 player saves. Canal players use pop-flashes, fight for close-range duels.
**Anti-Force A**: 3 players buy armor + Five-Seven A main, 2 players save. Force players smoke heaven, play for picks, then save.
**Connector Contact**: 2 players buy armor + upgraded pistols mid/connector, 3 players save. Connector players go for aggressive contact.
**B Contact**: 3 players buy armor + upgraded pistols B main, 2 players save. B players fight for site control with utility.
**Split Save**: 2 players force A main, 2 players force B main, 1 player saves mid. Both sides play for picks, saver rotates.
**Full Save**: All players save completely. 2 A main, 2 B main, 1 mid. Play for exit frags and positioning for next round.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **A Control**: 3 players buy rifles, 2 players SMGs. 2 rifles A main, 1 rifle mid, SMGs support. A rifles smoke heaven, take control.
**Mid Presence**: 2 rifles mid, 2 SMGs A main, 1 rifle B main. Mid rifles smoke connector, take upper control. Create multi-angle pressure.
**B Take**: 2 rifles B main, 2 SMGs mid, 1 rifle A main. B rifles clear site, take control. Mid SMGs support or rotate based on reads.
**Canal Control**: 3 players mid (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 2 SMGs A main. Mid players smoke connector, take canal control. Decide execute timing.
**Pick Heavy**: Spread rifles for picks. 1 rifle A main, 1 rifle mid, 1 rifle B main, 2 SMGs floating. Play for economy upgrade.
**A Focus**: 4 players A main (2 rifles, 2 SMGs), 1 rifle mid. A players smoke heaven, take site control. Mid rifle watches rotations.
**Connector Split**: 2 rifles mid, 2 SMGs A main, 1 rifle B main. Execute A split through connector and main. Mid rifles lead.
**Anti-Full Buy**: 2 rifles long angles, 3 SMGs close angles. Rifles hold mid and A main, SMGs play close. Use utility to isolate.
**Palace Control**: 2 rifles mid, 2 SMGs A main, 1 rifle B main. Mid rifles take palace control, coordinate with A main SMGs.
**Utility Heavy**: 2 rifles, 3 SMGs with heavy utility. Rifles take key angles, SMGs use smokes/flashes for coordinated team plays.

FULL_BUY.strategy: **A Execute**: Smoke heaven + connector, flash over smokes. 3 players A main, 2 players connector. Execute A site with perfect utility timing.
**Mid Control**: 3 players mid with full utility, 2 players A main. Mid players smoke connector + palace, take upper control. AWPer mid for picks.
**B Split**: 2 players B main, 3 players mid to B. Smoke connector + B site, flash over smokes. Execute B split with coordination.
**Canal Take**: 4 players mid, 1 player A main. Mid players smoke connector + canal, take canal control. Execute A through connector.
**Default Setup**: 2 A main, 2 mid, 1 B main. AWPer mid or A main, riflers support. Play for picks with utility. Execute based on info.
**A Fake to B**: 3 players make noise A main with utility, 2 players position mid. Once rotations happen, all 5 execute B through mid.
**Heaven Control**: 4 players A main with full utility, 1 player mid lurk. A players smoke heaven + default, take complete A control.
**Palace Execute**: 4 players mid with full utility, 1 player B main. Mid players smoke palace + connector, execute A. B watches rotations.
**Anti-Stack A**: Heavy utility on A main (multiple smokes + flashes), 4 players execute A site. 1 player mid watches for rotations.
**Late Round B**: Play default until 30 seconds, then all 5 execute B through connector/mid. Use utility for late timing advantage.
